Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is partially covered with a brown-yellow resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of red- and black-painted texts.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394110) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394110)
